name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reduce wast of time on YouTube

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prevent the wast of time in YouTube. By deleting all suggestions and youtube shorts, you prevent yourself watching useless videos.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Prevent the wast of time on YouTube. By deleting all video suggestions on the home page and youtube shorts button icons, you prevent yourself watching useless videos.

It doesn't prevent you from typing and searching videos on the search bar of course.
